name: Crisis In The Water
description:
Story 1: A Modern Ninja in a Hurry!
Schoolgirl Shouko gets kidnapped by a mysterious man and imprisoned in an abandoned factory.
But then, a girl in a ninja outfit appears...

Story 2: The Secret of a Lady and Her Maid!
Sumire is a maid working in a large mansion, but her mistress Erika punishes her any chance she can get.
Today, it looks like more of the same...
